## parseErrorResponse() function

Validates an error response against the API schema &amp; returns the input cast to the correctly narrowed type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseErrorResponse(jsonBlob: object): StateChannelsErrorResponse;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  jsonBlob | object | A javascript object that might be a valid [StateChannelsErrorResponse](./client-api-schema.statechannelserrorresponse.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

[StateChannelsErrorResponse](./client-api-schema.statechannelserrorresponse.md)

The input, but with the correct type, if it is valid.
